content: Actually, now that you have your own stream, may as well take the content there: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/genomics

All Genomics Implementers, based on discussions with Gil and re-evaluation of the test definitions, I have updated and uploaded new versions of the following scenarios: 02-Germline, 03-FamilyHistory, 04-DataWarehouse and 05-HLATyping.

The updates add initial test steps to created referenced resources on the target server; e.g. before creating an Observation, the referenced Practitioner, Patient and Specimen resources are first created.
06-SpecimenIdentity (for Species) has now been updated and uploaded to Touchstone.
In 06, in the Operation 'search - Sequence', it fails on the following URL:
Just uploaded our discussed change to 06-SpecimenIdentity. Please try again.
Kevin, I ran against your server and the 07-PathologyReport tests all passed.
08-SequenceQuality now updated and uploaded. Kevin, your server passes. :)
Shout out to @James Agnew .... thanks Richard for everything ...

Last update for now... 01-RegisterSequence has been updated and uploaded. Yes, Kevin, your server passes again. :) I also removed the 00-BasicOperations test definitions as the 01-08 scenarios now cover that level of functional testing.
I will upload all the updated test defintions and fixture resources to the FHIR SVN trunk in a few minutes.
Woohoo! I'm excited that this worked out!
